QuestData.Title: Blood of a Dead God
QuestData.Description: Mam'toth, the god of the mammoths, destroyed himself, and took much of his temple with him, rather than allowing his trolls to gain his power.$B$BIf I'm to sacrifice a portion of my spirit, I will need something with which to bolster myself.$B$BMam'toth left behind an enormous crater to the northeast, just north of the Altar of Quetz'lun. Within the crater his blood yet lives.$B$BBring it to me.
QuestData.LogDescription: Har'koa has asked you to collect 7 Blood of Mam'toth. Return them to her at the Altar of Har'koa.
QuestData.CompletionText: I wish that there were something that we could do to bring Mam'toth back to life, but there isn't.$B$BWe can honor him and his sacrifice by continuing the fight against the Drakkari.
QuestData.RewardText: Very well. Let us see if this works....
